extendedInfo.description: The Foley (Alabama) Public library has over 75,000 items, free downloadable audio books, E-books, public computers, genealogy services, free wireless access, public printing capabilities, Notary Public services, Fax services, book club, children's and teen's programming, nationwide interlibrary loan, reference services and much more!  Search the catalog, check your account, download ebooks and audios, access readers guides, text a librarian live and so much more with our free mobile app!  All of your library needs can be found at the tips of your fingers!

reviews.title: Fantastically Helpful
reviews.comment: I find this app to be extremely helpful!  You can manage your acct, ck to see if books at bkstore are in the library system, access online digital bks, & so much more.  Technology such as this is on the cutting edge & I am proud to say the Foley Library is riding atop that wave!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this app! I can scan a book I want at the store and it will see if its in the library system and then if I choose I can put it on hold! The person who says its rubbish doesn\'t know how to use this technology or this isn\'t their library system.
reviews.author: A Google User
